description: Grenache Rosé's vibrant acidity and red fruit flavors, like strawberry and raspberry, provide a delightful contrast to the savory and aromatic spices found in samosas.
food_pairing: Vegetable samosas, lamb samosas, cucumber raita

description: Mirabeau Provence is a delightful French rosé wine with flavors of strawberries, citrus, and herbs. It has a crisp acidity and a refreshing finish, perfect for warm weather enjoyment.
food_pairing: Summer salads, grilled fish, vegetable platter
appetizer_pairing: Caprese skewers, bruschetta with olive tapenade

description: Henry of Pelham Rosé is a refreshing Canadian wine with aromas of strawberries, watermelon, and citrus. It has a lively acidity and a crisp, dry finish, perfect for warm weather sipping.
food_pairing: Grilled shrimp skewers, summer salads, fruit tarts
appetizer_pairing: Goat cheese crostini with honey and thyme

description: Whispering Angel's Rosé is a Provence-style rosé with delicate flavors of strawberry, peach, and citrus. It has a light, refreshing acidity and a dry, crisp finish.
food_pairing: Salmon tartare, summer salads, grilled chicken

description: Miraval's Rosé is produced in collaboration with the Perrin family of Château de Beaucastel. It features flavors of red berries, floral notes, and hints of minerality, with a silky texture and a long, elegant finish.
appetizer_pairing: Shrimp cocktail with spicy cocktail sauce

description: AIX Rosé is a classic Provence-style rosé with aromas of strawberries and raspberries, complemented by floral notes. It has a crisp acidity and a refreshing finish, making it perfect for outdoor gatherings.
food_pairing: Mussels in white wine sauce, grilled shrimp skewers, Caesar salad

description: Hardys Stamp Shiraz Rosé is a vibrant and fruity rosé wine with flavors of ripe strawberries and hints of spice. It offers a refreshing acidity and a crisp finish, perfect for enjoying on warm summer days.
food_pairing: Grilled chicken, pasta primavera, mixed berry pavlova
appetizer_pairing: Antipasto platter with olives and cured meats

description: Roche Mazet's Cuvée Spéciale Grenache - Cinsault Rosé is a delightful blend offering a harmonious balance of Grenache and Cinsault grapes. It features flavors of red berries, citrus, and floral notes, with a crisp acidity and a refreshing finish.
food_pairing: Grilled seafood, Mediterranean salads, berry tart
appetizer_pairing: Goat cheese bruschetta with balsamic glaze
